author: Maria B.
title: Maria B.
text: I ordered some heat shrink tubing and mistakenly chose "multi" which in fact was the green/yellow colour. when I received it, I called them up and explained my situation, and they immediately acknowledged that the webshop description was confusing or "misleading" as they said. and they sent me out another package with the correct colours, free! :) Its unfortunate that the misunderstanding had occurred on my behalf, but the way they handled the situation was more than pleasing! ^_^ The customer service rep was amazing and friendly! And the service and prices are just great in general! Will definitely be buying from here again!
